vaccinepage.title: Afatan Mutirin Ponu (QR) Code
vaccinepage.subtitle: Kose mochen amasoua ewe taropwe ren epwe forata quick response (QR) code

dashboardpage.content1: Kinisou ren om nounou ei Digital COVID-19 Verification Record System. Makenong fitu tichikin poraus fan ren om kopwe angei ew QR code ren om kopwe feino ngeni om kopwe kuna pwaratan pwe mi wor noum COVID-19 on ei kamputer. Ika en mi mochen pwarano pwaratan om ka angei appos, en mi tongeni eaea ew chok me nein ekewe ruu ren epwe chok nom on kamputer ika fon ika printinau non taropwe ren om kopwe aanomu reom.
dashboardpage.content2: Chochon non ew famini ir mi tongeni ani fitu verification records ika taropwen pwarata epwe riri ngeni ew chok nampan fon ika email address, makenong ew digital record ika ew kapin epwe chok nom on noum kamputer ika fon.
dashboardpage.content3: Ew system e awora ew kapin om appos epwe nom on fon ika kamputer pwe nenien. Ika pwe ke angei om appos seni ew pekin ren muu-nap (Department of Defense, Indian Health Services (Ofesin Pekin Fiu, Angangen Aninisin Safean Indian)), ika Veteran Affairs (Tumunun Foforun Son Fiu)), iwe kopwe pwisin kokori ekewe pekin ren ar aninis.
dashboardpage.content4: Ika mi wor om kapas eis usun noum Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record mi nom on kamputer ika fon, tota won ewe Frequently Asked Questions (<1>FAQ</1>).

vaccineform.filloutheader: Kose mochen awesano met kei mi auchea epwe amasounong ren om kopwe angei ew QR code ngeni / kapin noum record ren COVID-19 online ika on fon me kamputer:
vaccineform.title: Poraus Fan Iten Ewe Chon Safei
vaccineform.subtitle: Met mi auchea epwe awesino ika amasounong ina mi mak esisinen *
vaccineform.phoneemailinfo: Awora ew nampan noum senfon ika email epwe riri ngeni me pwarata usun om appos. Ika pwe ekei ese pwata murin om makenong nampan noum senfon, sotuni sefani ka makeinong om email address.
vaccineform.pincode: Forata 4 nampa epwe noum PIN nampa. Kopwe angei ew link ika ew anen om kopwe makenong nampan noum PIN ren om kopwe tongeni kuna noum taropwen appos online ika on kamputer me fon. *
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg1: PIN esap chok 4 nampa tetenino chok
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg2: PIN esap eaea 4 nampa epwe aniwin fan ruu
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg3: Ewe PIN ke makenong ese pung. Kose mochen sotuni sefani ren om kopwe tiki ewe link ika anen epwe emwenuk ngeni ren om kopwe make sefaninong nampan noum PIN.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg4: Kose mochen sotuni sefani met ke mochen murin 1 minich.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg5: Kose mochen kokori kich ika om pekin pioin me safei ren tichikin poraus me aninis.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg6: Sise tongeni sipwe aponueta met ke tungor, kose mochen sotuni sefani.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg7: Ese pung sokkun nikinikin poraus, kose mochen sotuni sefani
vaccineform.note: <0>Mi Auchea:</0> Noun PIN mi auchea epwe kawor ren om kopwe tongeni kuna noum taropwen appos online ika on fon me kamputer.
vaccineform.checkboxdescription: Ren om cheki ei pwor, en ka pwarata pwe kopwe tipis ika ke mwaken fan annukun state me muu-nap pwe en emon chon safei ika Sam me Inn/Ewe a tutumunu ewe chon safei iwe ren ei wewe en ka angei mumutan om kopwe kuna an ewe chon safei taropwen appos.
vaccineform.safe: Aninis eoch, ese kamo, me watte aninisin apposen COVID-19 a kawor pwan monota ngeni meinisin ier 5 ika nap seni, <1>angei appos</1>.
vaccineform.fhealthcareprofessional: Nenien ewe pekin pioin ika safei
vaccineform.Subsubsubtitle: Porausen pwan ew appos ren appechekunen ewe apposen COVID-19
vaccineform.enterPin: Kose mochen makenong nampan noum PIN ewe ke fori ika ke mochen kuna noum taropwen appos online.

qrpage.title: Pusin omw digital COVID-19 Rekort ren verifikason
qrpage.name: Itomw:
qrpage.minrequirementsandroid: Kaukun me fan: Android verson 5 me Google Play Services verson 21.18 & watte seni.
qrpage.minrequirementsios: Kaukun me fan: Won pisekin iOS, kopwe aia ewe Safari minen teta wonlain (web browser).
qrpage.incorrect: Ika ewe porous won omw ewe digital rekorten apwos ese pwung ika kese angei ew apwos, ese pwung iten ika ekewe ranin apwos ke awora, mi ouchea kopwe apwungu ekei porous non omw ewe rekorten immunizason. En mi tongeni kori noumw ewe kangof epwe apwungu <1>ika kokori kich</1>. Sipwe esinei ngonuk ren met sia kuna me met ekewe angangen apwung ika fofor murin 2-3 week.

receivedpage.title: Risiten taropwen om tungor ren om katton noum taropwen apposen COVID-19 online ika on fon me kamputer.
receivedpage.content1: Om tungor a tori kich. Ika pwe ekewe poraus ke awora e mes ngeni met poraus mi nom non ach system, iwe kopwe angei ew link ika anen kopwe feino ngeni om kopwe kuna noum taropwen apposun COVID-19.
receivedpage.content2: Ika pwe kese angei ew link me non 24 awa, kose mochen sotuni sefani me nengen fichi pwe itom, ranin uputuom, nampan fon me email epwe mes ngeni ewe poraus ke awora atun ewe fansoun ke angei om appos.
receivedpage.content3: Ika mi wor om kapa seis usun ewe <1>Digital COVID-19 Verification Record</1>, mi wor penuan me rech. Ekewe sokun kapas eis ra chok soun eis (<3>FAQ</3>).

footer.faq: FAQ (Kapas Eis Ekon Nap Ach Eis)

faqpage.title: Kapaseis Ra kan Eis Iteiten (FAQS)
faqpage.01question: Met ei Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record?
faqpage.01answer: Noum <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</1> ew taropwen pwaratan om angei appos e nom online ika non kamputer kawor seni met taropwen appos mi wor non nenien maken iten chon angeni appos me non ofesin state. Ewe digital record e pwarata ekewe poraus mi mak on noum we taropwen appos seni COVID-19 vaccine card Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Katon apposun) COVID-19: itom, ranin uputuwom, inet ke angei appos me met sokkun appos ke angei. Ewe taropwen isois online mi pwan pachenong ew QR code ika pwe e scan seni ew SMART Health Card (SMART Katon Safei) reader epwe pwarata itom, ranin uputuom, inet ke angei appos me met sokkun. Ewe QR code epwan pwarata noum taropwen appos pwe ew enetin noun om state taropwen aisois.
faqpage.02question: Epwe ifa usun nei we taropwen pwarata epwe kawor ngeni?
faqpage.02answer: Nupwen noum we taropwen pwarata a pwata, kopwe angei ew link ika anen kopwe feino ngeni epwe titino non noum email ika nampan fon mi pach ngeni noum taropwen isois ren om appos. Murin om makenong nom kewe ruanu PIN ika nampa, kopwe kuna poraus usun noum COVID-19 afatan ren itom, ranin uputiwom, inet ke angei appos, me meni sokkun kompeni e fori ewe appos. Kopwe pwan angei ew minen scan ren QR code epwe pwarata pwe noum we verification record ika taropwen pwarata om angei appos mi enlet.
faqpage.03question: Ngang mi tongeni anomi nei digital afatan record on nei iPhone?
faqpage.03answer:
En mi tongeni isoni noum Digital Afatan record ika non ewe Apple Health app iwe ewe iOS operating system epwe 15. Mi eoch kopwe eaea ewe minen internet ren Safari ren an epwe unuseochuno ewe fofor.
Pwan, en mi tongeni screenshot ini ika fichi sasingan noum <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record ka isoni nein nom sasing.
faqpage.04question: Ngang mi tongeni isoni nei Digital afatan record on ew Android fon?
faqpage.04answer:
Ewer. En mi tongeni isoni noum <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record ngeni Google Pay ika en mi nounou Android version 5 me Google Play Services version 21.18 ika nap seni.
En mi tongeni fichi sasingan noum <3>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record ka isoni nein noum sasing.
faqpage.05question: Ika upwan angei pwan fitu appos, met epwe pwarata on nei we digital afatan record?
faqpage.05answer:
Apw. Ika pwe kepwan angei fitu appos ika angei pwan apechekunan ewe appos, esap chok pwata on noum we digital afatan record. Mi auchea kopwe poputa sefan non <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record system ren om kopwe angei ew minefon QR code.
Sia finata pwe kopwe witiwit non 3-7 ran ren om we appos ke keran angei ren an epwe pwata non ewe Ofesin Maken iten chon angei appos.
faqpage.06question: Inet ai we appos minefo epwe tongeni pachenong non ai digital afatan record?
faqpage.06answer: Ew me ew nenien safei e anongonong on ifa tamen are repwe tinanong porausen ewe minefon appos ngeni ewe Ofesin Maken iten chon angei appos. Sia finata pwe atun witiwit epwe 3-7 ran ren om we minefon appos epwe pwata non ewe system. Ika pwe porausen om angei appos ese pwata, ka tongeni <1>kokori kich</1>.
faqpage.07question: Epwe ifa usun ika rese kuna porausei?
faqpage.07answer:
Ewe pekin pioin ke appos ia epwe tinanong noum taropwen om angei appos ngeni ewe Ofesin Maken it ren chon angei appos, nge mi tongeni repwe wanong poraus mine ese unuseoch. Iwe, mi tongeni epwe nom rech noum taropwen appos, nge esap pung fich makken poraus. Awewe:

° Nampan senfon ika email address ese pachenong ika ewe appos ese wewe fengen
° Iit mi sokkona maken
° Ranin uputiw ese wewe fengen

Ren ar repwe kuna noum taropwe, sotuni ne makeinong sefan porausom nge epwe sokkun email ika nampan fon. Ika pwe porausen fan itom ese pwata, kokori ewe pekin ke feino angei appos ie pwe repwe siwini taropwen om angei appos ika <1>kokori kich ren om kopwe tungor ren kutesefanin noum taropwen appos. Repwe esinesin ngonuk ren met kewe sa kuna me ekewe fofor non ekewe 2-3 wik.
Ika pwe ke angei omw apos seni ew federal agency (usun ewe Department of Defense, Indian Health Services (Ofesin Pekin Fiu, Angangen Aninisin Safean Indian) ika Veterans Affairs (Tumunun Foforun Son Fiu)), iwe en ke nit kopwe kokori ekena agencies faniten aninis ren omw angangen apos.
faqpage.08question: Nge ika mi mwaan ai we Digital Afatan Record?
faqpage.08answer: Ika pwe ewe porous won omw we Digital record ren omw apos ese pung ika ew dose ese nomw, mi mwan ewe pwinin maram ika ese pung sokkun), ka tongeni apungu ika uwanong porousan mi pung non ekei chok ran faniten omw we immunization record. Ka tongeni kokori noum we chon awora ren omw kopwe uwanong porousan mi pung non ekei chok fansoun ren omw we record ika <1>kokori kich</1>. Epwe wor esinesin ngonuk ren met sa kuna me met sokkun fofor ren epwe aeochueno sa forinon 2-3 wik.
faqpage.09question: Ifa usun foforun ewe Digital COVID-19 Appos Record system?
faqpage.09answer: Ewe <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</1> system a atouawano ekewe COVID-19 records seni ewe an state we immunization systems. Uwanong itomw, ranin omw upwutiw, me ew email ika nampan fon mi riri ngeni omw we record ren omw angangen apos, murin ka fori ruanu-nampa ren PIN nampa. Ika pwe ewe porous auchea ke uwanong mi wewe ngeni osen ewe record, en kopwe angei ew text ika email mi fiti ew link ngeni omw <3>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</3>. Uwanong ewe PIN ke fori ren omw kopwe nengeni ewe record.
faqpage.10question: Met poraus meinisin fan itei epwe chok monomonona?
faqpage.10answer:
Ewer. Omw fael ni ew taropw won ewe system esapw awora omw kopwe iteiten nge tonong non omw we afatan record. Ewe link ngeni om we afatan record ika taropwen pwarata om angei appos mi auchea kopwe nounou nampan ewe PIN ke fori nge epwe chok noa ngeni nampan ewe fon ika email mi pach ngeni noum we taropwen isois ren om appos.
Ewe QR code ew SMART Health Card (Katon Safei MI TIPACHEM), ewe kapin omw we afatan record mi tumun. Ren pwan ekoch porous iei ren <1>https://smarthealth.cards. Ren omw kopwe tumunu pusin en, ewe QR code a tongeni an epwe chok skaan me anea me ren ewe mi SMART Health Card-compliant device.
faqpage.11question: Ngang mi tongeni fori sefani nampan nei PIN?
faqpage.11answer:
Ewer. Epwe ukukun non 24 awa seni ewe atun ka angei ewe link ika anen kopwe feino ngeni ren om kopwe makeinong noum we ruanu nampan PIN me tongeni tonong non noum <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record. Ika pwe kese, ewe link ngeni porausen om appos e nom online epwe kouno manamanin, nge en mi tongeni poputa sefan ren om kopwe fori sefani nampan noum PIN ren om eaea ewe <3>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record system.
Ika pwe ose chuen chechemeni noum PIN, murin 24 awa ka tongeni eaea ewe chok fofor ren omw kopwe fori ew minafon PIN.
<5>MI AUCHEA: Nupwen chok a tonong non omw digital record me seifini omw QR code, esapw ekspaer.
faqpage.12question: Met ei epwe tongeni awora pisekin pwarata ren nonomw ai apos?
faqpage.12answer:
Ewer. Iei pwan ew <1>me nein mettoch kopwe fori ren kaworen noum <3>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record iwe mi tongeni ne print-inau ika pwarata chok on noum fon ika kamputer. Ka pwan tongeni pwaranong noum COVID-19 vaccine card CDC, Katon apposun COVID-19 mi kawor COVID-19 card ika noum state immunization record.
Ese auchea omw kopwe awora ew <5>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record. A pusin nemeniomw ika kopwe awora porousen omw COVID-19 Afatan, nge ew maken nampa siwinin omw we non taropwe ren afatan rekert. Ew me nein ekewe mettoch epwe pwarata pisekin pwarata. Ewe state esapw isenanong ew system ren passport ar repwe chok fori.
faqpage.13question: Epwe ifa ika uwa nit siwini nei we apposun card?
faqpage.13answer: Ewe system a awora ew kapi digital ren noum we afatan record. Ika pwe ka poutano noum we afatan rekert non taropwe, ka tongeni printinau noum we digital record iwe ka nounou. Ika pwe ka poutano noum we <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</1>, iwe kopwene kan poputani ewe fofor won ewe system.
faqpage.14question: Met afis ngeni porousei kewe murin ai ngeni ekoch?
faqpage.14answer: Noum we <1>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</1> apwarata ewe chok porous usun chok noum we taropwen COVID-19 vaccine card CDC, Katon apposun COVID-19 vaccine card. En mi tongeni eisini ekewe organization mine mi tongeni skani ewe QR code non noum we <3>Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record</3> ifa usun ar repwe eaea omw we data ika repwe iseni. En chok ke tongeni finata ifa usun ika inet repwe eaea fengen omw we record.
faqpage.15question: Nge ika ua fori chomong appointment ren angangen apos faniten chomong aramas ren chok ew fon nampa?
faqpage.15answer: Ika pwe en emon sam me inn ika ewe chon tumunu ewe semirit nge ka fen fori chomong appointment ren ew chok fon nampa ika email, uwanong ew tungor fan ew non ew fansoun ren omw kopwe angei ekewe links mi imwu fesen faniten ew me ew afatan record.
faqpage.needhelpcontent01: Ren kapa seis me ekoch pekin aninis, kokori:
faqpage.needhelpcontent06: MI AUCHEA: Sise tongeni ach sipwe siwini noum Digital COVID-19 Afatan Record on fon.
